sentence: Why does the catholic church have so much money? because jesus saves.
explanation: To save means to rescue or protect from harm. To save can also refer to storing money for future use.
first_new_sentence: The lifeguard saves the drowning swimmer from an ocean current.
second_new_sentence: Many people save money in a bank account for retirement.

sentence: There is one rule to tennis love means nothing.
explanation: Love refers to a deep affection for someone, while in tennis, love means a score of zero.
first_new_sentence: Her love for her family was evident in her every action.
second_new_sentence: A score of love in tennis does not contribute to the game outcome.

sentence: What is the hardest part about being a pedophile? fitting in
explanation: Fitting can refer to being suitable or appropriate for something. Fitting can also mean physically adjusting an item to a specific size.
first_new_sentence: The tailor ensured that the new suit was fitting perfectly before the wedding.
second_new_sentence: The puzzle pieces are fitting together nicely, completing the picture.
